title: Photo Time Estimator
description: With this web app, you can estimate how long a batch of images will take to photograph. Average times are hard-coded, but you can opt to enter times manually. This helps at my photography job, to give clients a good estimate on when their product shots will be complete.

title: Music Scroller
description: This is an in-progress web-based teleprompter application geared toward singer/song-writers who perform on-stage. It is not completed as of yet but some areas are working. It will have the ability to create, edit, share, and display songs as a traditional teleprompter would.

title: Shared Grocery List
description: Shared Grocery List is designed to keep the shopper connected with an at-home participant. Inspired by COVID to reduce the amount of customers inside stores. It will update in real-time when the shopper has crossed-off an item or added/deleted an item. It will include real-time chat.

title: Ortho TN
description: This page was a massive team effort, built from the ground up, from concept to completion, using WordPress and the Themeco plugin Cornerstone. It includes use of custom fields, custom post types, PHP custom code, and much more.

title: UT Self Health
description: A symptom assesment page that redirects the user to the proper channels. Built for the University of Tennessee in Knoxville.

title: Tiger Haven
description: This page was built from the ground up, from concept to completion, using WordPress and the Themeco plugin Cornerstone. It includes use of custom fields and custom post types.

title: The Mason Center
description: This page was built from the ground up, from concept to completion, using WordPress and the Themeco plugin Cornerstone. It includes use of custom fields and custom post types.

title: Vade Inspacers
description: This is a simplified version of a game inspired by the popular game Space Invaders. It was my first complete game I ever programmed back in 2017.

title: My Links
description: This is a personal links catalogue for personal use.

title: Quasar Image Database
description: This is a personal project that I am revamping for my employer. The original is a featurelss Windows application that has many limits. It is being recreated as a cross-platform web app.

title: Quota Calculator
description: This calculator can sum up a day's work in my previous photography department, giving the user a 'score' for each photographer's day's work.

title: Stereogram Maker
description: When completed, the Stereogram Maker will be able to receive 2 similar images from the user and place them side-by-side to make a cross-eye or paralell stereogram. It will also have the ability to output the final product as a single image.
